short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily create draft posts on WordPress sites you have access to.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WP Scratchpad is a Chrome extension for quickly and easily creating draft posts on your WordPress site, no matter where you are on the web. It lives in your browser bar so that whenever inspiration for a blog post strikes, you can quickly jot down the idea, provide any relevant links, save the post as a draft and get back to browsing. All in just a few clicks and without having to log in to your WordPress site!
